title: Seeking pc hardware experts
body:
Hi there peoples. Im heading off to uni next year and currently looking to buy a pc for school work and to play league on and was wondering if this laptop could run league alright. Looking for 60fps or better with average or higher graphics settings. Here are the specs....

SPECIFICATIONS
Brand/Model: Toshiba Satellite P50-C00X
Processor: 2.4GHz Intel core i7-5500U dual core processor
Memory: 16GB DDR3L (1600Mhz) RAM (Memory at maximum supportedl)
Disk Drive: 256GB M.2 SSD HDD
Optical Drive: DVD Writer
Display: 15.6" FHD Widescreen with LED Backlit Display (1920 x 1080)
Webcam: Built in HD Webcam with Mic
Connections/Ports: WLAN (INTEL 802.11ac/a/g/n) up to 867Mbps + Toshiba Bluetooth V4.0, HDMI supporting 4K2K output, 3 x USB 3.0 Ports + Sleep & Charge
Software: Windows 8.1 (64-bit)
Warranty: 12 Months
Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M Graphics
Sound: Harmon Kardon speakers

replies.body: Yah dude, that should run League pretty well! I'd go for it dude
that would easily run league and very nicely, you would probs want a larger HDD tho.
Its an SSD tho. Which means 10x faster basically :X
yes obvs but I meant just in terms of his uni and outside of gaming, its not very large for storage
I understand an ssd loads alot faster and plan to have an external for school work to not clog up the laptop
